trait.name: Proficiencies
trait.text: You gain proficiency in the Nature and Survival skills.
You are also proficient with poisoner's kits.

trait.name: Languages
trait.text: You read, speak, and write your choice of either Undercommon or Deep Speech.

trait.name: Spelunker
trait.text: You are an expert at surviving outside of the established settlements of the Underdark. While underground, you have an innate idea how far below the surface you are, and an intuitive sense for direction such that you always know which direction is north. Additionally, unless you are in a particularly barren part of the Underdark, you can successfully forage for fungi, plants, lizards, insects, and small animals, and find sufficient water, to sustain yourself and five companions.

trait.name: Starting Equipment
trait.text: A hooded lantern, a climber's kit, 50 feet of silk rope, 5 candles, a tenday's worth of rations, a set of common clothes, and a belt pouch containing 15 gp
